12 template <typename VoxelType>
13 void getSphereAroundPoint(const Layer<VoxelType>& layer, const Point& center,
14  FloatingPoint radius,
15  HierarchicalIndexMap* block_voxel_list) {
16  CHECK_NOTNULL(block_voxel_list);
17  float voxel_size = layer.voxel_size();
18  float voxel_size_inv = 1.0 / layer.voxel_size();
19  int voxels_per_side = layer.voxels_per_side();
20 
21  const GlobalIndex center_index =
22  getGridIndexFromPoint<GlobalIndex>(center, voxel_size_inv);
23  const FloatingPoint radius_in_voxels = radius / voxel_size;
24 
25  for (FloatingPoint x = -radius_in_voxels; x <= radius_in_voxels; x++) {
26  for (FloatingPoint y = -radius_in_voxels; y <= radius_in_voxels; y++) {
27  for (FloatingPoint z = -radius_in_voxels; z <= radius_in_voxels; z++) {
28  Point point_voxel_space(x, y, z);
29 
30  // check if point is inside the spheres radius
31  if (point_voxel_space.norm() <= radius_in_voxels) {
32  GlobalIndex voxel_offset_index =
33  Eigen::floor(point_voxel_space.array()).cast<LongIndexElement>();
34 
35  // Get the block and voxel indices from this.
36  BlockIndex block_index;
37  VoxelIndex voxel_index;
38 
39  getBlockAndVoxelIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
40  voxel_offset_index + center_index, voxels_per_side, &block_index,
41  &voxel_index);
42  (*block_voxel_list)[block_index].push_back(voxel_index);
43  }
44  }
45  }
46  }
47 }
48 
49 template <typename VoxelType>
50 void getAndAllocateSphereAroundPoint(const Point& center, FloatingPoint radius,
51  Layer<VoxelType>* layer,
52  HierarchicalIndexMap* block_voxel_list) {
53  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer);
54  CHECK_NOTNULL(block_voxel_list);
55  getSphereAroundPoint(*layer, center, radius, block_voxel_list);
56  for (auto it = block_voxel_list->begin(); it != block_voxel_list->end();
57  ++it) {
58  layer->allocateBlockPtrByIndex(it->first);
59  }
60 }
61 
62 // This function sets all voxels within a Euclidean distance of the center
63 // to a value equal to the distance of the point from the center, essentially
64 // making it a filled sphere with that center and radius.
65 // Marks the new points as halllucinated and fixed.
66 template <typename VoxelType>
67 void fillSphereAroundPoint(const Point& center, const FloatingPoint radius,
68  const FloatingPoint max_distance_m,
69  Layer<VoxelType>* layer) {
70  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer);
71  HierarchicalIndexMap block_voxel_list;
72  getAndAllocateSphereAroundPoint(center, radius, layer, &block_voxel_list);
73 
74  for (auto it = block_voxel_list.begin(); it != block_voxel_list.end(); ++it) {
75  typename Block<VoxelType>::Ptr block_ptr =
76  layer->getBlockPtrByIndex(it->first);
77  for (const VoxelIndex& voxel_index : it->second) {
78  Point point = block_ptr->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
79  Point voxel_center_vec = point - center;
80 
81  VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
82  // The distance of the voxel should map to actual meaningful
83  // Euclidean distance; in this case, the sphere center has the max
84  // distance, and the edges should have the lowest distance.
85  // Also compress this to the max distance given.
86  const FloatingPoint new_distance =
87  std::max(voxel_center_vec.norm() - radius, -max_distance_m);
88 
89  if (!voxel.observed || new_distance < voxel.distance) {
90  voxel.distance = new_distance;
91  voxel.observed = true;
92  voxel.hallucinated = true;
93  voxel.fixed = true;
94  block_ptr->updated() = true;
95  block_ptr->has_data() = true;
96  }
97  }
98  }
99 }
100 
101 // Similar to above, clears the area around the specified point, marking it as
102 // hallucinated and fixed.
103 template <typename VoxelType>
104 void clearSphereAroundPoint(const Point& center, const FloatingPoint radius,
105  const FloatingPoint max_distance_m,
106  Layer<VoxelType>* layer) {
107  CHECK_NOTNULL(layer);
108  HierarchicalIndexMap block_voxel_list;
109  getAndAllocateSphereAroundPoint(center, radius, layer, &block_voxel_list);
110 
111  for (auto it = block_voxel_list.begin(); it != block_voxel_list.end(); ++it) {
112  typename Block<VoxelType>::Ptr block_ptr =
113  layer->getBlockPtrByIndex(it->first);
114  for (const VoxelIndex& voxel_index : it->second) {
115  Point point = block_ptr->computeCoordinatesFromVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
116  Point voxel_center_vec = point - center;
117 
118  VoxelType& voxel = block_ptr->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(voxel_index);
119  // How far is voxel from edge of free sphere. The values should be
120  // biggest in the center, smallest outside.
121  const FloatingPoint new_distance =
122  std::min(radius - voxel_center_vec.norm(), max_distance_m);
123 
124  if (!voxel.observed || new_distance > voxel.distance) {
125  voxel.distance = new_distance;
126  voxel.observed = true;
127  voxel.hallucinated = true;
128  voxel.fixed = true;
129  block_ptr->updated() = true;
130  block_ptr->has_data() = true;
131  }
132  }
133  }
134 }
135 
136 // Utility function to get map bounds from an arbitrary layer.
137 template <typename VoxelType>
138 void computeMapBoundsFromLayer(const voxblox::Layer<VoxelType>& layer,
139  Eigen::Vector3d* lower_bound,
140  Eigen::Vector3d* upper_bound) {
141  FloatingPoint block_size = layer.block_size();
142 
143  BlockIndexList all_blocks;
144  layer.getAllAllocatedBlocks(&all_blocks);
145 
146  BlockIndex lower_bound_index;
147  BlockIndex upper_bound_index;
148 
149  bool first_block = true;
150 
151  for (const voxblox::BlockIndex& block_index : all_blocks) {
152  if (first_block) {
153  lower_bound_index = block_index;
154  upper_bound_index = block_index;
155  first_block = false;
156  continue;
157  }
158 
159  lower_bound_index = lower_bound_index.array().min(block_index.array());
160  upper_bound_index = upper_bound_index.array().max(block_index.array());
161  }
162 
163  *lower_bound =
164  getOriginPointFromGridIndex(lower_bound_index, block_size).cast<double>();
165  *upper_bound =
166  (getOriginPointFromGridIndex(upper_bound_index, block_size).array() +
167  block_size)
168  .cast<double>();
169 }
